title.rendered: AqualisBraemar adds to London loss adjusting team

content.rendered:
We are delighted to announce that we have continued to strengthen our London office with Mark Beleski joining the adjusting team as an Energy Loss Adjuster.

Mark is an experienced engineer with a background in petroleum engineering, he worked for a number of energy companies and oil service companies where he developed expertise in reservoir engineering, optimisation of assets and all forms of evaluation and commercial economic analysis of assets and operations. Mark obtained an MSc in Petroleum Engineering from London South Bank University after his BSc Geological Sciences (Hons). Mark joins AqualisBraemar from MatthewsDaniel where he started his career as a Loss Adjuster. 

“Mark joins our team in London and adds excellent energy engineering experience and a highly analytical approach to adjusting” said Allan Kelly, Managing Director of the group’s adjusting division in Europe and West Africa. “Though it’s a challenging time to decide to move companies, our ambitious plans convinced Mark to join this growing team. I’m looking forward to working with Mark.”

AqualisBraemar is a leading offshore, marine and loss adjusting consultancy to the energy, shipping and insurance industries. The company is part of Oslo-listed consultancy group AqualisBraemar ASA.

For further information, please contact:

Investors and financial media

Kim Boman, CFO, AqualisBraemar ASA
Telephone: +47 959 63 912

Other media enquiries

Endre Johansen, Corporate Communications AS
Telephone: +47 41 61 06 05
Email: endre.johansen@corpcom.no

About AqualisBraemar ASA
AqualisBraemar ASA (OSE: Aqua) offers independent consultancy services to the offshore energy (oil & gas and renewables), shipping and insurance industries. The group employs specialist engineers, naval architects, master mariners, loss adjusters and technical consultants in 33 countries worldwide. AqualisBraemar ASA operates under three brands:
  • AqualisBraemar: a leading adjusting, marine and offshore consultancy to the energy, shipping and insurance industries
  • AqualisBraemar Yacht Services: a specialised marine consultant to the superyacht market
  • OWC: an independent consultancy to the offshore renewables sector
